sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Booked = (props) => { if (!props.data) { return (

Booking Failed! Try Again!


Book Again!
); } console.log(props.data); const { id, from, to, pickup, drop, price, travels, seats, discount, customer, payable } = props.data; return (

Booking Confirmed

From:

{from} Central Parking

To:

{to} Central Parking

Pickup Time:

{new Date(pickup).toLocaleString()}

Drop Time:

{new Date(drop).toLocaleString()}

Your Traveller:

{travels}

Seats Booked:

{seats}

Discount:

{discount}% for {customer}

You Have Payed:

© {payable}/-

You Have Payed:

Booking ID: {id}

); }; export default Booked;
